    Sunshine Group
    • Customer Service
    • Policy
    2. Customer service
    Customer Service
    1. Purchase policy

    1. Cash payment on delivery (COD): Simple - Safe

    COD stands for Cash On Delivery, meaning payment on delivery

    With this payment method, you will pay cash to the delivery staff, right after receiving your order

    Immediately after receiving an order via email, Sunshine will confirm with you by phone, carry out order and delivery.

    Sunshineaccepts payment upon delivery (COD) for all orders nationwide.

    2. Online payment via payment

    Sunshine accepts online payment for all orders by card with customers with ATM cards (registered Internet Banking) or credit cards of different banks

    After completing the online payment, Sunshine staff will contact customers directly and proceed with delivery procedures

    2. Shipping method

    1. Delivery: Free delivery, nationwide

    2. Delivery time / delivery:

    After receiving the order, within 24 hours, Sunshine will actively contact you to confirm the order and specific delivery time.

    Delivery time after the order has been shipped to the shipping unit will depend on your shipping address:

    • + In the area of ​​Ho Chi Minh City: 1-2 working days
    • + Other areas: 3-5 working day .
    3. Return policy

    1. REGISTER TO PAY BACK

    Contact hotline to register for exchange / pay including Saturday and Sunday.

    2. RECEIVE CONFIRMATION MESSAGE

    A confirmation message and a change / return instruction email will be immediately sent to the customer right after the customer has registered for a successful exchange / return.

    3. RETURN

    Return the goods at the postal system or in the nearest showroom

    4. Privacy Policy payment

    Commitment to confidentiality

    Card payment system is provided by payment gateway partners ("Portal Partners."

    Payment ”) has been licensed to operate legally in Vietnam. Accordingly, the standards

    Securing card payment at Sunshine ensures compliance with industry security standards.

    Customer's financial information will be protected during the transaction process using SSL (Secure Sockets Layer) protocol.

    • • Certification of payment information data security standards (PCI DSS) by
    • Trustwave provided.
    • • One-time password (OTP) is sent via SMS to ensure financial access Account authenticated.
    • • Standard 128-bit MD5 encryption.
    • • Information security rules and regulations in the banking and finance industry regulations of the State Bank of Vietnam.
    5. Ordering Intructions

    You can order online at the website through 7 basic ordering steps.

    Please refer to the detailed information on each step of ordering as follows:

    1. Search products

    2. Add products to cart

    3. Check cart and order

    4. Login or register for an account

    5. Fill in the shipping address

    6. Select a payment method

    7. Check and confirm orders

    6. FAQs
